Administrative Officer Job at TAIDOB College




        
    

        
        TAIDOB College is a government approved private secondary school strategically located within Goshen Estate, Asero, Abeokuta, Ogun State. Dr. Abayomi Oluwatosin Jiboku, a seasoned educationist cum administrator established the college in October 1994 as a model with the motive of providing educational services to all races irrespective of gender, religion, tribe or social status. This unique citadel of learning is situated in a quiet, serene and conducive environment, equipped with modern educational infrastructural facilities and of dedicated and experienced tutors.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Officer
Job Location: Abeokuta, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Responsibilities


	Attending to all administrative-related issues
	Handle correspondence: emails, letters, phone calls, and official documents
	Ensure smooth filing and retrieval systems
	Support exam logistics, school events, and internal communications
	Monitor attendance and prepare daily/weekly reports


Requirements


	Must possess at least B.Sc / B.Ed / HND in Business Administration, Mass Communication, or other related fields from reputable institutions.
	Must possess at least 2 years of cognate experience working as an administrator.
	Meticulous attention to details with superb organizational skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


Salary
N105,000 - N120,000 Monthly.

M|ethod of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: tcrecruitment10@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

	JC International, a leading Pipeline and Process Services (PPS) provider to the oil and gas industry, is seeking for skilled and experienced PPS Engineers with a strong background in Nitrogen works, Pigging, and Chemical Cleaning to join our team.

Pipeline & Process Engineer Job at JC International




        
    

        
        JC International provides World Class specialist Asset Integrity Assurance and Training services throughout the Asset life-cycle.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Pipeline & Process Engineer

Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers

About the job


	JC International, a leading Pipeline and Process Services (PPS) provider to the oil and gas industry, is seeking for skilled and experienced PPS Engineers with a strong background in Nitrogen works, Pigging, and Chemical Cleaning to join our team.


Objective
     

            
    




	To provide high-quality engineering support in the planning, execution, and supervision of PPS-related operations, ensuring safe, efficient, and cost-effective service delivery that meets client and industry standards.


Roles & Responsibilities
The ideal candidate/candidates will:


	Plan, prepare, and execute PPS operations including nitrogen purging, pigging, hydrotesting and chemical cleaning.
	Ensure efficient use and proper maintenance of diverse PPS equipment such as nitrogen converters, chemical injection pumps, flooding/lift pumps, and many more.
	Carryout nitrogen purging, leak testing, and pressure testing operations in line with industry standards.
	Supervise field operations to ensure compliance with safety, quality, and environmental procedures.
	Maintain accurate records of operations and generate job completion reports.
	Liaise with clients, project teams, and vendors to ensure project requirements are met.
	Train and mentor junior staff to build internal competence and knowledge transfer.
	Ensure adherence to JC International’s QHSE standards across all operations.
	Interpret technical drawings, P&IDs, and project specifications to design and implement suitable process solutions.
	Troubleshoot operational issues and ensure minimal downtime during projects.


Qualifications


	BSc or HND in any Engineering discipline or Sciences.
	Minimum of 7 years of field experience in Pipeline and Process Services.
	Sound knowledge of oil & gas operational procedures and safety standards.
	Proficiency in the use of relevant tools and equipment and reporting software.
	Valid professional certifications and offshore/onshore training (e.g., BOSIET, OSP etc).


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment.ph25@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Marketing & Customer Relations Officer",
  "description": "HiiT Plc owns Nigeria&rsquo;s foremost ICT Training/Education Institute, HiiT Training Institute (HiiT for short) with Training Centres across the Nation. We commenced training operations as Hands-on Institute of Information Technology (HiiT) on Monday, 15th April 1996, and we have graduated over 50,000 Students at our Training Centres across the Nation in the past 26 years.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Marketing &amp; Customer Relations Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;HiiT Abuja Branch (MCROHAB)
Direct Report: Business Manager.

Role Summary


	Customer Relations Management and Marketing functions at Abuja Branch.


Key Accountabilities
Customer Relations Management Functions:


	Manage CRM functions.
	Supervise the collection, collation and analysis of Prospects and Customers data for informed marketing decision making.
	Sustain and improve on Brand reputation.


Marketing Management Functions:


	Support the actualization of set
	Territory&#39;s Marketing and sales Goals/ Objectives.
	Support lead generation and conversion process to achieve S/N1 above.


Experience and Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Marketing, Mass Communication, or any Social Sciences field with at least 2/2 from an approved Tertiary Institution.
	A minimum of 1 year of proven experience in Marketing and Customer Relations Management in a corporate environment.
	Generic understanding of the Nigerian ICT Fducation Sector.


Core Competencies &amp; Skills:


	Must be ICT and Social Media Savvy.
	Must possess Marketing/Sales Skills.
	At least intermediate skills in MS Word and Excel.
	Good written and verbal communication.
	Excellent work ethics and Integrity.
	Creativity and problem-solving Skills.


Remuneration
Attractive with Performance Bonus opportunity.

Projected Resumption Date
Not later than August 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should their CV to:&nbsp;hhcm@hiitplc.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Marketing & Customer Relations Officer Job at HiiT Plc




        
    

        
        HiiT Plc owns Nigeria’s foremost ICT Training/Education Institute, HiiT Training Institute (HiiT for short) with Training Centres across the Nation. We commenced training operations as Hands-on Institute of Information Technology (HiiT) on Monday, 15th April 1996, and we have graduated over 50,000 Students at our Training Centres across the Nation in the past 26 years.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing & Customer Relations Officer

Job Location: HiiT Abuja Branch (MCROHAB)
Direct Report: Business Manager.

Role Summary
     

            
    




	Customer Relations Management and Marketing functions at Abuja Branch.


Key Accountabilities
Customer Relations Management Functions:


	Manage CRM functions.
	Supervise the collection, collation and analysis of Prospects and Customers data for informed marketing decision making.
	Sustain and improve on Brand reputation.


Marketing Management Functions:


	Support the actualization of set
	Territory's Marketing and sales Goals/ Objectives.
	Support lead generation and conversion process to achieve S/N1 above.


Experience and Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Mass Communication, or any Social Sciences field with at least 2/2 from an approved Tertiary Institution.
	A minimum of 1 year of proven experience in Marketing and Customer Relations Management in a corporate environment.
	Generic understanding of the Nigerian ICT Fducation Sector.


Core Competencies & Skills:


	Must be ICT and Social Media Savvy.
	Must possess Marketing/Sales Skills.
	At least intermediate skills in MS Word and Excel.
	Good written and verbal communication.
	Excellent work ethics and Integrity.
	Creativity and problem-solving Skills.


Remuneration
Attractive with Performance Bonus opportunity.

Projected Resumption Date
Not later than August 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should their CV to: hhcm@hiitplc.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note


	Must be Resident in Abuja
	Also open to individuals who just recently completed NYSC or looking for PPA.
